Name: Bulbasaur
RedBlueDex: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
YellowDex: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

Name: Ivysaur
RedBlueDex: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
YellowDex: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

Name: Venusaur
RedBlueDex: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
YellowDex: The flower on its back catches the sun's rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.

Name: Charmander
RedBlueDex: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
YellowDex: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.

Name: Charmeleon
RedBlueDex: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
YellowDex: Tough fights could excite this Pokémon. When excited, it may blow out bluish-white flames.

Name: Charizard
RedBlueDex: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
YellowDex: When expelling a blast of super hot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

Name: Squirtle
RedBlueDex: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
YellowDex: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

Name: Wartortle
RedBlueDex: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
YellowDex: When tapped, this Pokémon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

Name: Blastoise
RedBlueDex: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
YellowDex: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.

Name: Caterpie
RedBlueDex: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
YellowDex: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.

Name: Metapod
RedBlueDex: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
YellowDex: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

Name: Butterfree
RedBlueDex: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
YellowDex: Its wings, covered with poisonous powders, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.

Name: Weedle
RedBlueDex: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
YellowDex: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

Name: Kakuna
RedBlueDex: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
YellowDex: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

Name: Beedrill
RedBlueDex: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
YellowDex: It has 3 poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

Name: Pidgey
RedBlueDex: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
YellowDex: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

Name: Pidgeotto
RedBlueDex: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
YellowDex: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

Name: Pidgeot
RedBlueDex: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
YellowDex: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

Name: Rattata
RedBlueDex: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
YellowDex: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.

Name: Raticate
RedBlueDex: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
YellowDex: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

Name: Spearow
RedBlueDex: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
YellowDex: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

Name: Fearow
RedBlueDex: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
YellowDex: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

Name: Ekans
RedBlueDex: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.
YellowDex: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

Name: Arbok
RedBlueDex: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
YellowDex: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

Name: Pikachu
RedBlueDex: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
YellowDex: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

Name: Raichu
RedBlueDex: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
YellowDex: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.

Name: Sandshrew
RedBlueDex: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
YellowDex: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

Name: Sandslash
RedBlueDex: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
YellowDex: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

Name: Nidoran♀
RedBlueDex: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
YellowDex: A mild-mannered Pokémon that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.

Name: Nidorina
RedBlueDex: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
YellowDex: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

Name: Nidoqueen
RedBlueDex: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
YellowDex: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this Pokémon. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

Name: Nidoran♂
RedBlueDex: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
YellowDex: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

Name: Nidorino
RedBlueDex: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
YellowDex: Its horns contain venom. If they are stabbed into an enemy, the impact makes the poison leak out.

Name: Nidoking
RedBlueDex: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
YellowDex: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

Name: Clefairy
RedBlueDex: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
YellowDex: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

Name: Clefable
RedBlueDex: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
YellowDex: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

Name: Vulpix
RedBlueDex: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
YellowDex: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

Name: Ninetales
RedBlueDex: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
YellowDex: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this Pokémon.

Name: Jigglypuff
RedBlueDex: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
YellowDex: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

Name: Wigglytuff
RedBlueDex: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
YellowDex: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.
